details:
Announce of Turba H3 (2.0.5) (final):

> This [2.0.5] is a security release that fixes cross site
> scripting vulnerabilities in several of the address book
> name and contact data fields. None of the vulnerabilities
> can be exploited by unauthenticated users; however, we
> strongly recommend that all users of Turba 2.0.4 upgrade
> to 2.0.5 as soon as possible.
summary: turba -- Cross site scripting vulnerabilities in several of the address book name and contact data fields
